quote: Where there is peace, there is sports; where there is sports, there is peace. Peace is what allows us, especially young people, to dream, go after one's goals and prepare you for the next challenge in life.
author: Kim Yuna

quote: Boxing is a celebration of the lost religion of masculinity all the more trenchant for its being lost.
author: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: Golf is a game in which one endeavors to control a ball with implements ill adapted for the purpose.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: Baseball life is a tough life on the family.
author: Nolan Ryan

quote: You've got to enjoy time with your family and friends, and if you're involved in sports franchises, those peak moments in playoff games. You have to enjoy life.
author: Paul Allen

quote: I just got hooked on the radio, the voice of it all. It was my connection to metropolitan America, if you will. Sports, in particularly baseball then 'cause of its rich sediment of numbers, was one of the first things a young person could peg up with adults on - that is, you could know as much about Jimmy Fox as your father did.
author: George Will

quote: Black people dominate sports in the United States. 20% of the population and 90% of the final four.
author: Chris Rock

quote: Talk radio has almost ruined the sports fan.
author: Phil Simms

quote: Sports betting is all about money management, so the most money won on one event is not the most important thing.
author: Bruce Dern

quote: As a result of Title IX, and a new generation of parents who want their daughters to have the opportunities they never had, women's sports have arrived.
author: Sheryl Swoopes

quote: The things that people do now in sports, you can't even believe. These are complete total athletes. To see what human beings can do in the highest level is amazing.
author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quote: There's a whole lot more to the African-American community than entertainment and sports.
author: J. C. Watts

quote: I learned early on, stay away from politics, stay away from religion and don't talk about sports. Those three right there will get you in trouble.
author: Gabriel Iglesias

quote: Growing up, I looked up to major league baseball players, and now these young women have amazing, incredible women all across the board, from swimming to gymnastics to softball to basketball. It is incredible how far women have come and women in sports have come.
author: Jennie Finch

quote: When we talk about reviews, what we are really talking about is just a market report - it's like reading about the new Lexus. You have to know what the guy writing the review cares about to understand his take. Does he like sports cars, or does he like Bentleys?
author: Mike Nichols

quote: I still feel that in India we look upon sports as a recreational activity - which it is - but people have to understand that there is a career in sports. It's not just necessary to be a doctor or a lawyer or an engineer, as most of us Indians appear to think that our children should grow up to be.
author: Abhishek Bachchan

quote: When I was little, I guess I was just an ordinary kid. But then things changed when I was in junior high. You know, kids that become geeks become one because of something. Like, they aren't good at sports, or girls don't like them. I, too, for some reason, got into things like science fiction and, well, especially science fiction as an escape.
author: Takashi Murakami

quote: Leadership is one of sports' intangibles. Guys can score, guys can fight, guys can skate faster than anybody else. But not everybody can say, 'Follow me.'
author: Paul Coffey

quote: I grew up in a very 'Friday Night Lights,' sports-focused town. I did not play the sports. I was never bullied physically, but I was called names. I was also an overweight kid. I knew what it's like to feel like the other, to feel written off for things that were not in my control - my appearance, my interests.
author: Robin Lord Taylor

quote: The political hero is not like the sports champion or matinee idol or daring inventor; like the war hero, he is born only of tragedy.
author: David Grann

quote: To be honest, I'm shocked the University of Washington's sports teams are called the Huskies. Why haven't the Leftists that run this entire state demanded they be renamed the 'Athletes of Size' so as to not fat shame anyone?
author: Milo Yiannopoulos

quote: The diet for climbing all the time isn't really different from the diet for living. It's not like cardio sports where you're burning a bajillion calories every day.
author: Alex Honnold

quote: Thus so wretched is man that he would weary even without any cause for weariness... and so frivolous is he that, though full of a thousand reasons for weariness, the least thing, such as playing billiards or hitting a ball, is sufficient enough to amuse him.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: A lifetime of training for just ten seconds.
author: Jesse Owens

quote: Football is violence and cold weather and sex and college rye.
author: Roger Kahn

quote: I grew up in New York City, where we played highly unorganized sports: stick ball, stoop ball, and the occasional game of baseball with no adult supervision.
author: Jeff Greenfield

quote: It's hard to create new friendships outside sports.
author: Tim Tebow

quote: It is hard to compete with other sports. Badminton is a sport which, when compared with football and tennis, still needs promotion.
author: Lin Dan

quote: After one Olympics, if we invest in sports and say we will get a gold medal in the next Olympic, it doesn't work like that in sports. How it works is that you provide the infrastructure, provide education about nutrition and health.
author: Mahendra Singh Dhoni

quote: There's food and supplements that you can take legally that will better your body and help you stay healthy. Shortcuts are something that's always been around all sports, but as a union, we're trying to do the best we can to weed those guys out of the game.
author: Jake Arrieta

quote: What other people may find in poetry or art museums, I find in the flight of a good drive.
author: Arnold Palmer

quote: The only thing a golfer needs is more daylight.
author: Ben Hogan

quote: If I weren't earning $3 million a year to dunk a basketball, most people on the street would run in the other direction if they saw me coming.
author: Charles Barkley

quote: If you drink don't drive. Don't even putt.
author: Dean Martin

quote: The only way to prove that you're a good sport is to lose.
author: Ernie Banks

quote: He's got an overall flair for the game. It looks to me like he really loves what he does and he can't wait to get up in the morning, go hit some balls and go play.
author: Gary McCord

quote: I had pro offers from the Detroit Lions and Green Bay Packers, who were pretty hard up for linemen in those days. If I had gone into professional football the name Jerry Ford might have been a household word today.
author: Gerald R. Ford

quote: I regard golf as an expensive way of playing marbles.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Eighteen holes of match play will teach you more about your foe than 18 years of dealing with him across a desk.
author: Grantland Rice

quote: The triple is the most exciting play in baseball. Home runs win a lot of games, but I never understood why fans are so obsessed with them.
author: Hank Aaron

quote: Baseball players are smarter than football players. How often do you see a baseball team penalized for too many men on the field?
author: Jim Bouton

quote: Golf appeals to the idiot in us and the child. Just how childlike golf players become is proven by their frequent inability to count past five.
author: John Updike

quote: He hits it long. His shoulders are impressively quick through the ball. That's where he's getting his power from. He's young and has great elasticity.
author: Nick Faldo

quote: Fans don't boo nobodies.
author: Reggie Jackson

quote: The difference between the old ballplayer and the new ballplayer is the jersey. The old ballplayer cared about the name on the front. The new ballplayer cares about the name on the back.
author: Steve Garvey

quote: Nobody roots for Goliath.
author: Wilt Chamberlain

quote: If a tie is like kissing your sister, losing is like kissing you grandmother with her teeth out.
author: George Brett

quote: Many baseball fans look upon an umpire as a sort of necessary evil to the luxury of baseball, like the odor that follows an automobile.
author: Christy Mathewson

quote: All sports for all people.
author: Pierre de Coubertin

quote: I'm a competitive person and I love the challenge of mastering new things.
author: Sasha Cohen

quote: The Olympic Games must not be an end in itself, they must be a means of creating a vast programme of physical education and sports competitions for all young people.
author: Avery Brundage

quote: I enjoyed being involved in team sports and making close friendships.
author: Brian McBride

quote: The American people are sheep. They're comfortable, rich, working. It's like the Romans, they're happy with bread and their spectator sports. The Super Bowl means more to them than any right.
author: Jack Kevorkian

quote: The importance that our society attaches to sport is incredible. After all, is football a game or a religion? The people of this country have allowed sports to get completely out of hand.
author: Howard Cosell

quote: My priority is to turn people - especially kids - on to sports and being active so they don't even have to think about it being good for their health. If people participate for the fun of it, and believe me - it is fun, then fitness programs will be much more successful.
author: Alan Thicke

quote: I was very fortunate to play sports. All the anger in me went out. I had to do what I had to do. If you stay angry all the time, then you really don't have a good life.
author: Willie Mays

quote: The addiction to sports, therefore, in a peculiar degree marks an arrested development in man's moral nature.
author: Thorstein Veblen

quote: Sports without music, it's nothing but a game. Music adds the emotion.
author: Ice Cube

quote: Amateurism is the strongest form of discrimination in sports. Because it discriminates against the underprivileged, it discriminates against the poor. If we want sports to go back to the wealthy, let's make it amateur again.
author: Carl Lewis

quote: I did all the right things in so many tournaments. But like I said, sometimes in sports it just goes the other way. Maybe you've already won so much that it evens it out a bit sometimes. I don't know.
author: Roger Federer

quote: I'm not good at anything except writing jokes. I wasn't good at sports, I wasn't good at anything artsy, ever. I think there was a real worry for a while about what I would be good at. I was just this chubby little Indian kid who looked like a nerd.
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: That's the biggest gap in sports, the difference between the winner and the loser of the Super Bowl.
author: John Madden

quote: Sports and entertainment are the only places where inner-city kids see themselves being able to succeed. Their intellectual development is something they don't relate to.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: I've always been really active. I grew up playing sports, so I'm always shooting hoops or throwing the football with my friends. I'm super-active in that sense.
author: Taylor Lautner

quote: I was focused on athletics, outdoors, sports.
author: Joe Namath

quote: I also have a soft spot for spicy chicken wings. They are always best eaten at dives and sports bars, like Wogie's in the West Village, New York City, near my house.
author: Gail Simmons

quote: I worked at my high school newspaper at Andover, which came out weekly, unusual for a high school paper. Then my first day at Penn I went right to the 'Daily Pennsylvanian' and pretty much spent most of my college career working both as the sports editor and then editor of the editorial page.
author: H. G. Bissinger

quote: When a sports movie really works, it gets you on all levels, because the stakes are high. It's black and white. It's win or lose.
author: Carla Gugino

quote: If architecture is, as is sometimes said, music set in concrete, then football and basketball may be said to be creativity embodied in team sports.
author: Michael Mandelbaum

quote: The BBC sports department when I was there was seriously to the right of Ghengis Khan, and if people think I am strange, they should have met some of the production staff I worked with. Margaret Thatcher and the Queen were the pin up girls for many of them.
author: David Icke

quote: Sports fans have been mistreated for a long time. They have overpaid for inferior food and they have had poor service.
author: Dave Checketts

quote: You know, I never really paid attention to sports, which, coming from the mecca of football in Texas, is kind of odd. I played sports, but I was nerdy. Having a single mother, the pressure was on me to get good grades and a scholarship and go to college.
author: Sarah Shahi

quote: American sports are quite masculine. And football - although it's still played by men all over the world - football compared to American football is quite feminine in its artistry. And there's no padding. It's America's loss, though.
author: Noel Gallagher

quote: My love for sports will never die. I love martial arts and I want to promote it in whichever way I can. I am a fighter first, then an actor.
author: Akshay Kumar

quote: Compared to politics, I think sports is funnier, because it's inconsequential. And politics can be real important and all that. The more pointless something is, the funnier it is, you know?
author: Norm MacDonald

quote: Political columnists and sports pundits are rewarded for being overconfident.
author: Daniel Kahneman

quote: My son has taken liking for sports and is most of the time playing cricket and football. It is so much fun being with them, as I'm enjoying every phase of motherhood.
author: Karisma Kapoor

quote: In 1964, when Lee Iacocca said, 'Shelby, I want you to make a sports car out of the Mustang,' the first thing I said was, 'Lee, you can't make a race horse out of a mule. I don't want to do it.' He said, 'I didn't ask you to make it; you work for me.'
author: Carroll Shelby

quote: I have always maintained that if you work hard, it won't go waste, as recognition will come to you at some stage, whether in studies or sports. You need to have good intentions and intent to move ahead in life as well as in sports.
author: Suresh Raina

quote: You always hear that tragedies put sports in perspective, that they prove we shouldn't care this much about the successes and failures of a bunch of wealthy strangers. I'm going the other way - sometimes, sports put everything else in perspective.
author: Bill Simmons

quote: When I was a little kid growing up in Iceland, I always dreamed about creating something that could have an impact on the whole world, and even as a young boy I was passionate about fitness and sports.
author: Magnus Scheving

quote: Compared to politics, I think sports is funnier, because it's inconsequential. And politics can be real important and all that. The more pointless something is, the funnier it is, you know? And the more grave or important things are... You know, some comedians can get this disease where they get serious all the time.
author: Norm MacDonald

quote: I've always liked speed. I own a car that I shouldn't be talking about because I'm an environmentalist, but the 1955 Porsche Spyder 550 RS is the finest sports car ever made.
author: Robert Redford

quote: I have learned, in my life and work as a sportswriter, that big-time Sports and big-time Politics are not so far apart in America. They are both a means to the same end, which is victory... And why not? Victory is good for you, and don't let anybody tell you different.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Politics should not interfere with sports. And sports should impact politics.
author: Vladimir Putin

quote: Everyone thinks I'm this jock of a woman, but I didn't play any sports. I didn't even let my kids play baseball because I was afraid they were going to get hit by balls.
author: Patti Hansen

quote: Global sports tournaments have a range of benefits that go far beyond the games themselves. They can transform the image of a country or a region. They bring people together and reveal new possibilities to a nation's youth.
author: Richard Attias

quote: 'Potato-chip news' is news that's repetitive, requires little effort to absorb, and is consumable in massive quantities: true crime, natural disasters, political punditry, celebrity gossip, sports gossip, or endless photographs of beautiful houses, food, or clothes.
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: I won't have any competitive instincts in any sports, other than golf. I can't see being competitive in sports any more.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: J.J. Watt is larger than life and Houston's newest sports hero, in every sense of the word. He is a guy who spends NFL Fridays at high school football games and actively seeks out those in need of his kindness.
author: Hannah Storm

quote: Drama is played at the pace of chess... or billiards... or poker. Engrossing? Sure. But comedy is played at the jubilant, high-octane speed of sports like basketball or hockey.
author: Mark Waters

quote: Team sports are very important for shaping personalities. It's important that kids understand the mentality behind playing team sports and playing for one another and playing with friends.
author: Brian O'Driscoll

quote: I grew up a Michael Jordan fan; that was my first idol. But my true sports idol was Deion Sanders: he was the person I always wanted to be. I wanted to play two sports professionally, which would never happen, but to me, that was every kid's dream.
author: Tim Howard

quote: Our philosophy is you need to give nonprofit money for health, nutrition, education, culture, and sports.
author: Carlos Slim

quote: It's great to listen to men talk about sports or fights or war or even hunting sometimes, but the presence of the other, the presence of art and beauty, which crude masculinity seems to discount, is essential. Real civilization and real manhood seem to me to include those.
author: James Salter

quote: I always liked to write and had fun writing, but I didn't have any pretensions about being a writer. I liked to read and liked to putz around and write little stories or poems, but my thing was sports.
author: John Edgar Wideman

quote: When I was younger, I used to bite my nails so bad. I used to play sports; I played, like, every sport. I would be playing soccer, and I'd be in the middle of the field just zoned out, biting my nails, and I'd, like, miss the ball going past me.
author: Kendall Jenner

quote: For me to be with someone, he's got to be fit. Or at least doing something he loves. Following your passion - whether it's hiking or sports or whatever - is super sexy.
author: Kaley Cuoco

quote: My becoming a film actor was more a twist of tale than a chosen course because I dared not to think I could ever become an actor. I couldn't even walk up on a stage and say 'Thank you' when we were to receive trophies at our sports meets at college.
author: Dilip Kumar

quote: I never use the word 'hero' in sports. Hero is way above 'star.' I save 'star' for sports. Sports is entertainment that's all it is.
author: Bud Grant

quote: We knew sports was important to us and our family, but there are priorities in life.Obviously, faith is foremost; how we did in school is important. If we didn't handle that business then there were no privileges.
author: Stephen Curry

quote: Whatever free time I get, I love to catch news and sports shows.
author: Amitabh Bachchan

quote: I get a lot of letters that say, 'I'm a normal, down-to-earth girl. I love to cook, and I love sports.' What I also get are letters from a whole bunch of moms saying, 'My daughter is awesome,' and, 'My daughter is a great daughter.'
author: J. J. Watt

quote: Cleveland's a great city. I love the city. The people here are awesome. They're loyal and hard-working, and they're loyal to our sports scene, and things are changing here.
author: Stipe Miocic

quote: Unless you enjoy life passionately, you cannot be a good artiste. Practise what you like, be it sports or dancing.
author: Sarita Choudhury

quote: The idea of growing up in the South and being a man is an interesting thing; there's a lot masculinity involved, with hunting, fishing, and playing sports that rural people take pride in, but at the same time, I grew up really not wanting to hate anybody.
author: Jason Isbell

quote: I wanted to really ingrain myself in the culture and the people. And I apologize about having an allergy to dairy products that gives me some irritable bowels, but other than that, I mean, I've embraced just about everything else Wisconsin - especially when it comes to sports, but also the people and the interactions with our fans.
author: Aaron Rodgers

quote: The problem with winter sports is that - follow me closely here - they generally take place in winter.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Sports is human life in microcosm.
author: Howard Cosell

quote: In the field of sports you are more or less accepted for what you do rather than what you are.
author: Althea Gibson

quote: I sort of try to write everything for me. I'm a huge sports fan but have no interest in minutiae. I don't remember who won Super Bowls five years ago or listen to sports talk radio. I'm trying to make sure the jokes are self-contained so they're accessible to everyone.
author: Norm MacDonald

quote: It sounds like a cliche, but it... you do sing about what you know about. And I grew up in a small town, and I grew up in a place where your whole world revolved around friends, family, school, and church, and sports.
author: Kenny Chesney

quote: Actually, I always dreamed about getting a gold medal in the 100-meter freestyle in Olympic swimming. I always thought that would be the epic award in sports to get.
author: Chris Klein

quote: It's not just the kid who's spent every penny from his job to upgrade his car to tell the world he cares about sports cars, it's also the person driving around in a fuel-conscious hybrid electric car, because it's more a message to the world than an effective means of saving fuel, to be quite honest.
author: Richard Hammond

quote: I wasn't into sports when I was younger. I was one of those kids who always tried to get a note from the doctor to say I had a cold so I didn't have to go play hockey in bad weather and be miserable.
author: Eliza Doolittle

quote: I like a few vintage Rolexes, and Panerais are good. I'm not into sports watches - I like chronometers.
author: Jason Statham

quote: I'm a great sports fan, you know. I love to watch tennis and basketball and baseball and so on.
author: Itzhak Perlman

quote: When I played sports, if you lose the game, and then you complain, that makes you a sore loser. That doesn't make you protester - that just makes you a whiner.
author: D. B. Sweeney

quote: When I was a kid, I did many sports. Judo, like my dad, but also volleyball, handball, and gymnastics. We never played much football.
author: Robert Lewandowski

quote: As far as oligarchs who acquire sports team abroad, and invest money abroad, I wouldn't treat this phenomenon as something bad.
author: Vladimir Putin

quote: As an athlete and as a woman, I get my confidence from playing sports because it shifts your focus from what your body looks like to what your body can do for you. That's what we all should be doing. It shouldn't be about looking perfect.
author: Venus Williams

quote: My dad is the reason I actually started watching wrestling. My dad was never big into sports; we were all big into sports as kids, and he'd go to our Little League games or whatever and not really know what was going on, because he didn't know about sports, but he knew about wrestling.
author: John Cena

quote: My son is trying to be a sports writer, and my daughter is a college student. She wants to be a comedy writer, and she's at film school. I discouraged both of them early on from getting involved in Starbucks. I didn't think it would be fair; plus, they didn't have any interest anyway.
author: Howard Schultz

quote: If you're a dope like me, you get every sports channel you can get. I'm watching, you know, Netherlands soccer.
author: Michael Keaton

quote: What separates sports from entrepreneurism, however, is that in business we constantly have to overcome undefined and unpredictable challenges. Athletes train for specific events and conditions, whereas entrepreneurs generally have little idea what they will encounter along the way.
author: Naveen Jain

quote: Sports without music is just a game. Music makes it entertaining.
author: Ice Cube

quote: I would never tell anybody to give up hockey - the great sports we have here - basketball, lacrosse - rugby coming into its own - we've got so many great team sports, and I say hold on to them.
author: George Vecsey

quote: I have been president of the Indian Kabbadi Association, and likewise, I have been associated with various other sports as well.
author: Sharad Pawar

quote: I've always been a reserved cat. When I play sports, there's people used to get mad at me because I didn't hang out and things like that. I've never been that kind of person. Nothing has changed in that regard. I've never been posse, and all that. I'm a quiet storm.
author: Bernie Mac

quote: You never know what's going to happen with this crazy world of sports entertainment, so I would never rule out the fact that Rock wants to come home.
author: Roman Reigns

quote: One of the biggest gaps in sports is the difference between the winning and losing teams of the Super Bowl. They don't invite the losing team to the White House. They don't have parades for them. They don't throw confetti on them.
author: John Madden

quote: I have never seen a wrestling match or a prize fight, and I don't want to. When I find out a man is interested in these sports, I drop him.
author: Hedy Lamarr

quote: My becoming an actor wasn't planned. My interest always lied in sports such as football, martial arts, gymnastics and dance.
author: Tiger Shroff

quote: When I grew up, my father taught us the value of hard work. He wanted us to enjoy ourselves, but he also wanted to know what it took to be successful. He coached a lot of our sports teams growing up. We weren't very good, but we learned about hard work and enjoying life and your teammates.
author: Andrew Luck

quote: I drink a lot of Body Armor - it's a sports drink. It offers great hydration, and it's the best before/after drink for workouts. Orange mango is my favorite. Strawberry banana is a close second.
author: Andrew Luck

quote: If I ever have downtime, I'm usually sitting in my place playing video games. Or eating sandwiches somewhere, or watching sports some place.
author: Hannibal Buress

quote: There are a few things that people all around the world need to admit to themselves. Trade restraints slow economic growth, the euro is not a reserve currency, and scoreless sports ties are boring.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: When I was fifteen, I dreamed of living in the big city, as many a young person does if he is artistic and sensitive. By 'artistic and sensitive' I mean short, skinny, unkissed, bad at sports, and carrying a C average in high school.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: The purpose of sports - even foreign sports - is not to bore people.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: If your man is a sports enthusiast, you may have to resign yourself to his spouting off in a monotone on a prize fight, football game or pennant race.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: I was always the youngest person in class, skinny, scrawny, no good at sports. I asserted myself by being smart. But then I got to college and started to get C's and D's. That was fantastic. I no longer had to be the smartest person in the room.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: To have a healthy culture, you have to have stable health care financing and stable arts financing and stable sports financing, and if you don't have that, your culture becomes a parking lot.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: Selling an electric sports car creates an opportunity to fundamentally change the way America drives.
author: Elon Musk

quote: I can't say this enough - the food that you put into your bodies can actually help you get better grades. And it can also affect your performance in sports and other activities too. You see, when you give your body the best possible fuel, you have more energy, you're stronger, you think more quickly.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: I like sports, and I enjoy playing basketball and lifting weights.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: When I used to play sports, I'd be the one cheering the team on, 'Come on, we can beat these guys!' That's just in me.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: We don't see a lot of models for male social interaction. There's sports and barn raisings.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: It was easy being healthy when I was young. I was full of energy, so sports and physical challenges were fun. But as I got older and the spring left my step, exercise became harder, and eating, drinking and watching TV became easier. By the time I was 50, I'd put on 50 pounds.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Well, I'm not a big sports fan.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: Sports are basically our way of feeling sorry for ourselves. Most men can't become athletes. We're watching guys who actually made it. We see them dunking and making touchdowns. Then we think about ourselves when we were younger.
author: Kevin Hart

quote: February is always a bad month for TV sports. Football is gone, basketball is plodding along in the annual midseason doldrums, and baseball is not even mentioned.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: I'm always fascinated by the use of the first-person plural talking about sports.
author: Penn Jillette

quote: My whole family is missing that sports gene. I hope I didn't screw that up by marrying a great golfer.
author: Penn Jillette

quote: I wouldn't dream of watching motor racing, cycling, or golf - which aren't truly sports anyway.
author: Howard Jacobson

quote: I spend a little time every day to play sports.
author: Vladimir Putin

quote: Above all, such sports as judo, in my view, teach people to relate to each other. They teach us to respect a partner, teach us to understand that an externally weak partner can not only put up worthy resistance, but, if you relax and take too much for granted, may even win.
author: Vladimir Putin

quote: I watch movies and sports. I can count on the fingers of my hand the number of times I have watched an hour show. I never watch a half-hour show, and I never watch myself.
author: William Shatner

quote: Most people think the character I do onstage is the way I am offstage, but I'm just a regular guy who spends time with his family and who turns on the television and watches a lot of sports.
author: Don Rickles

quote: When you look at golf films before us they're all - garbage or satire. A lot of sports films tend to vilify the opposition. Where the opposition becomes this big angry monster, so big you can't beat him.
author: Shia LaBeouf

quote: Unfortunately the world is what it is now. People don't get along for whatever reason. As professional athletes, in a way we're almost ambassadors for peace, because sports brings everyone together.
author: Venus Williams

quote: In the sports arena I would say there is nothing like training and preparation. You have to train your mind as much as your body.
author: Venus Williams

quote: I think women athletes who have been successful need to help other sports, those sports that are just emerging. That's what I've been thinking about and looking forward to.
author: Venus Williams

quote: Tennis has been around for so long - women have been playing the majors since the 1800s. Other sports have not had professional leagues for women for as long.
author: Venus Williams

quote: Tennis is definitely a star for women in sports.
author: Venus Williams

quote: I spent my whole life playing sports and training and pushing myself to the limits.
author: Venus Williams

quote: My deep dark secret is that I was a nerd in school. I liked the theater. I liked to study. I wasn't very good at sports.
author: Rob Lowe

quote: At home I have a copy of the April 21, 1986, issue of 'Sports Illustrated.' I'm on the cover with the blurb, 'Can Lou Do It?' I'd just arrived at Notre Dame, and with spring football underway, I was the focal point of that week's coverage.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: I look at athletes in all sports and try to picture what kind of football player they'd be, what position they'd play and so on.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Pittsburgh felt like the perfect size of a city to me. There's enough to do, but it's not like living in a circus. I also really loved how sports-enthusiastic Pittsburgh people are: how proud of their sports they are.
author: Joel Edgerton

quote: There aren't a lot of opportunities for that rite of passage that makes you a man. War is one of them, and violent sports are another.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: I like a deep sports massage - a casual beating up. I try to get them whenever I can, usually more if I'm getting in shape for a role.
author: Chris Pine

quote: I wasn't good in school. I didn't do sports. I sat in the bedroom and listened to records. Because the Beatles did whatever they wanted to, I took that as a kid and said, 'That's what rock is.'
author: Chris Cornell

quote: I'm sort of like a lame, single guy in a red sports car.
author: Billy Corgan

quote: I'm actually a fan of all of the EA Sports titles like 'Tiger Woods,' 'Madden,' and I'm really looking forward to buying 'NBA Street V3.'
author: John Cena

quote: My dad is not a sports guy but was drawn to the theatrics of wrestling.
author: John Cena

quote: The ESPYS are about appreciating moments in sports and not looking down on it because it's maybe not your favorite athlete or your favorite team.
author: John Cena

quote: Unlike other sports, which are largely determined by individual athletic ability or team strength, NASCAR requires its competitors to cooperate in order to win.
author: Charles Duhigg

quote: On the court, Jason Collins is not a huge basketball star, but he has already claimed his place in civil rights history as the first openly gay athlete to play in one of the four major U.S. sports leagues.
author: Nancy Gibbs

quote: It certainly is dangerous that there are only a few clubs left in Europe that can afford to pay millions. At the end of the day however, the spectators decide the rates of pay - by watching the games and consuming the goods and services advertised on sports TV programmes.
author: Angela Merkel
category: Day, End, End Of The Day

quote: Good spectator sports share certain fundamentals. Their competitors battle head-to-head. Their winners are determined objectively: fastest runner, most points. They are refereed, not judged.
author: Alex Berenson

quote: Downhill track sports like luge are technology battles, as exciting as a NASCAR qualifying day.
author: Alex Berenson

quote: Both sexes like the exercise and challenge of sports, but for men it's also a basic display behavior for impressing and winning a mate.
author: Helen Fisher

quote: My brothers were funny, and there was a lot of shtick and comedy and nastiness and violence and fighting and sports.
author: Alec Baldwin

quote: Not many countries establish a prize for peace. The Seoul Peace Prize has its roots in the 1988 Summer Olympics when this country opened its doors to people and athletes from more than 160 countries. Korea did so in part because it believes in the power of sports for peace and development.
author: Ban Ki-moon

quote: If there was a template for success in sports, everyone would follow it. You do the best you can and trust the people you trust.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: Owning a popular sports team is very different than any other type of business. They don't throw parades when Apple has the biggest quarter in corporate history. People don't call and email asking for anyone from the team to come visit their sick child. They don't cry as they request a jersey of their child's favorite player to be buried with them.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: Boxing has become America's tragic theater.
author: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: I'm girlie in the sense that I like makeup, but I also love sports and man food.
author: Carrie Underwood

quote: We should reach out to people to try to go after the fans the way other sports do. Because we can't just depend on the fact that it is a great game.
author: John McEnroe

quote: Tennis was a white, upper-class sport, and I wanted it to be treated like other sports were.
author: John McEnroe

quote: I played a ton of team sports growing up, and team wins are just incredibly gratifying.
author: Jason Bateman

quote: A sports writer is a stylist of some kind. He is trying to convey mood and character and emotion.
author: David Shields

quote: Sports passion is deeply, infamously territorial: our city-state is better than your city-state because our city-state's team beat your city-state's team. My attachment to the Sonics is approximately the reverse of this.
author: David Shields

quote: I'm a sucker for sports movies.
author: David Shields

quote: The movie - any sports movie - becomes a praise song to life here on earth, to physical existence itself, beyond striving, beyond economic necessity.
author: David Shields

quote: Sports movies are often very good at dramatizing the intersection of public and private realms: the body politic.
author: David Shields

quote: When I was studying at the Iowa Writers School, I read a sports writer, Ron Maly, from the Des Moines Register. He was a good sports writer. I became real interested in the contrast between Lute Olson, who was the coach of Iowa at the time, and Ron Maly.
author: David Shields

quote: I think of sports writers as mediating between two worlds. Athletes probably think of sports writers as not macho enough. And people in high culture probably think of sports writers as jocks or something. They are in an interestingly complex position in which they have to mediate the world of body and the world of words.
author: David Shields

quote: Sports - especially the NBA - function as a place where American society pretends to discuss and pretends to solve questions and historical agonies that can't possibly be solved within the realm of sports.
author: David Shields

quote: What Olympians eat can vary tremendously depending not only on the events they're competing in, but also their body type and lifestyle outside the Olympic arena. Their diets are affected not only by the demands of their sports, but by everything else in their lives, things that are almost impossible to accurately measure and factor in.
author: Chuck Norris

quote: Nike used to be known as Blue Ribbon Sports. What's now Sara Lee used to be Consolidated Foods. And Exxon was once Standard Oil Company of New Jersey. These were name changes that worked. But for all the ones that do, there are 10 or 20 that don't.
author: James Surowiecki

quote: In Tulsa, it was sports or nothing.
author: Bill Hader

quote: When somebody asks about the greatest players in history, I start with Bill Russell. More than the best player is the MVP, and the MVP in the history of team sports is Bill Russell.
author: Bobby Knight

quote: At the end of the day, everything is God's plan, and he cares about what we do. He cares about our hearts, how we play the game, and how we treat people. He's definitely involved with how we handle sports and not just the outcome of it. I'm proud when athletes mention God in any way.
author: Tim Tebow

quote: I want to support kids that not a lot of people believe in. Give them an opportunity to do good in school, play sports and get scholarships.
author: Tim Tebow

quote: I was a sports kid.
author: Mahershala Ali

quote: In a small town, it's either sports or a band with your buddies. I was always athletic. But in college, I was exposed to all this new music, and I was drawn to hip-hop and R&B.
author: Sam Hunt

quote: I've always craved winning. It's just easier in sports because there's a scoreboard.
author: Sam Hunt

quote: I was totally dominated and revered my father. I admired everything he did. He was a great sports person. He loved me. I was his only boy at that time, before my brother Billy came along.
author: Jimmy Carter

quote: I don't watch too much TV when it comes to sports or news or things like that.
author: Colin Kaepernick

quote: I played a lot of sports when I was a kid so I get in that ballgame mindset of being really, really respectful, but at same time saying to yourself, 'Don't back down a single inch, hang with these guys if you can.' If they throw it high and tight you have to stand in there, you can't take yourself out of that moment.
author: Michael Keaton

quote: I'm getting more and more bored with professional sports, but I still watch.
author: Michael Keaton

quote: Even from their infancy we frame them to the sports of love: their instruction, behavior, attire, grace, learning and all their words azimuth only at love, respects only affection. Their nurses and their keepers imprint no other thing in them.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: For truly it is to be noted, that children's plays are not sports, and should be deemed as their most serious actions.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Mayweather Promotions - we are the past, the present, and the future of sports and entertainment, and everybody knows Mayweather's pay is better.
author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: I come from a very athletic family. But I didn't have the typical Jewish sports heroes. I mean, like lots of Jewish kids I admired Sandy Koufax. But I didn't look up to him as the one person who gave me the desire to push on and succeed. My brothers did that for me.
author: Bill Goldberg

quote: What passes for sports coverage is terribly sycophantic.
author: Billy Crystal

quote: Don't let anyone turn you into a slave. You're a slave if you let the media tell you that sports and entertainment are more important than developing your brain.
author: Ben Carson

quote: In order to develop the country's sports in line with the great leaders' ideas and plan of developing Juche-based sports, our Party directs great efforts to the work of the sports sector.
author: Kim Jong-un

quote: Building a sports power is a patriotic undertaking aimed at translating into reality the plan and wish of the great leaders, who devoted their efforts to building ours into a country that prospers and grows stronger on the strength of sports.
author: Kim Jong-un

quote: I'm a mad lover of sport. You cannot say a bad word to me about sports. So I know business is involved and I know it can be cynical, and, of course, I watch it, but for me it's pure.
author: Hugh Jackman

quote: Most people never run far enough on their first wind to find out they've got a second.
author: William James

quote: It's always been such a big part of my life to be fit and healthy and be outside and run and play sports. It gives me energy. Sometimes, I have these days where I don't do anything because I have the days off, and I just need to relax, and I actually get more tired.
author: Caroline Wozniacki

quote: I think they need to get a more reliable way of watching television on the laptop. Because I travel so much, if I want to watch my favorite sports team it might not be showing in that place, so I want a reliable way to watch whatever I want to watch on my laptop.
author: John Legend

quote: Fantasy sports went a long way toward developing the sabermetrics formulas used not only by oddsmakers but general managers in hiring players. So the amateur fantasists ended up creating some of the algorithms that Oakland GM Billy Bean's statisticians used to win games with less salary money available for star players.
author: Douglas Rushkoff

quote: Breaking records is not something you expect to be doing. That's like a sports thing, it's not usually a comedy and writing thing.
author: Louis C. K.

quote: ABC wouldn't be a player in the news major leagues until the 1970s, when Roone Arledge brought to ABC News the energy and programming approach he had applied to ABC Sports.
author: Tom Brokaw

quote: I've got some great stuff in my sports memorabilia collection. But my favorite thing by far is the robe. I actually have a Ric Flair robe with 'the Nature Boy' on the back. That's awesome. When I look at it, it brings back so many memories of my childhood and my teen years.
author: Darius Rucker

quote: Sports are sports. Its all about how we carry ourselves out of the ring.
author: George Foreman

quote: I'd have to say losing the title to Ali in '74 was the lowest moment in sports for me. It was the most devastating thing in my boxing career, and it still hurts to this day.
author: George Foreman

quote: My sister is totally my dad's daughter because she loves sports.
author: Ashley Tisdale

quote: Oh God, I'm awful at sports. In gym I just try and avoid getting hit in the face.
author: Tavi Gevinson

quote: I made the cover of 'Sports Illustrated,' 'Newsweek' and 'Time' all in one week, and I didn't even know what that meant.
author: Nadia Comaneci

quote: I started my career as a swimsuit model. My first big break in America was 2007, 'Sports Illustrated' Swimsuit Issue.
author: Irina Shayk

quote: No one pretends anymore that the Olympics are just about sports. It's routine to talk about what effect holding the Games in this or that capital will have on the host country's international reputation, how a nation's prestige can be raised by its medal count.
author: George Packer

quote: The Olympics are never just about sports.
author: George Packer

quote: If the presidential nominating process were an international sports competition, one would assume that top officials of both parties were taking envelopes of cash from town chairs in Durham and precinct captains in Waterloo.
author: George Packer

quote: Of course the first version of an all-electric sports car is going to be expensive.
author: Jason Calacanis

quote: I don't do sports, really.
author: Stellan Skarsgard

quote: In various fields, such as science, technology, sports, business and the arts, immigrants enrich our culture every single day.
author: Charles B. Rangel

quote: I did play other sports growing up. I played cricket and all those other things, but I was just so much more talented in golf, and that's all I wanted to do.
author: Jason Day

quote: I'm into outdoor sports like hiking, windsurfing, water-skiing.
author: Nikki Reed

quote: I read a lot growing up. It was kind of my comfort, you know; I loved it. I love story. I love narrative. I was academic. I wasn't particularly athletic. I didn't make the drill team. I didn't go out for sports.
author: Julianne Moore

quote: If you want experiences to make you a better person, then you play two or three sports.
author: Jim Brown

quote: Museums are like sports stadiums, hotels and hospitals: they are in the category of captive-audience dining.
author: Danny Meyer

quote: Restaurants and chefs have become followed by such a broad swath of the public, in a way that used to be reserved for sports stars, movie stars, and theater actors. Restaurants are in the firmament of today's common culture.
author: Danny Meyer

quote: I know I could be the host of 'SportsCenter' in two years if I changed my show today to sports.
author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: The main thing is healthy eating, exercise, which I do for special events, like if it's Sports Illustrated, or the swim suit catalogue for Victoria's Secret, or my own calendar that I did for the year 2000.
author: Heidi Klum

quote: I grew up reading the newspapers, mostly the sports section. I was a wrestler and would check to see if I was ranked.
author: Michael Pena

quote: It's so important for kids to get involved with sports in general at a young age.
author: Lindsey Vonn

quote: I get very into my sports.
author: Margot Robbie

quote: I was not good at team sports, I have to say. I'm quite good at individual sports, but I was not good at team sports, so I wasn't good at baseball and football.
author: Tom Ford

quote: I grew up in a two-parent household. We all played sports, all sports, which cost a lot of money. My pops was an attorney; he went to College of the Holy Cross with Clarence Thomas. My mom worked a bit, then gradually came home and took care of us full time.
author: Omari Hardwick

quote: I'm a black Catholic raised in Decatur, Georgia, which was very gang-infested. Then, I went to an all-white private high school and excelled in sports and wrote poetry, then played football at the University of Georgia, minoring in drama.
author: Omari Hardwick

quote: I always loved the way music made me feel. I did sports at school and all, but when I got home, it was just music. Everybody in my neighborhood loved music. I could jump the back fence and be in the park where there were ghetto blasters everywhere.
author: Dr. Dre

quote: When did I know I had talent? I think it started when I first started playing sports, organized sports.
author: LeBron James

quote: I remember growing up, having sports to go to, having recess, those were the things I looked forward to. Yes, I'm an athlete, but I had buddies who weren't, and they looked forward to it, too.
author: Ashton Eaton

quote: If somebody wants me to do something I've never done, I can do it more easily because of all of the years of sports I've played.
author: Ashton Eaton

quote: I went to a football school, which meant that I went to a university that served up education and was simultaneously operating a sports franchise.
author: Susan Orlean

quote: I have long been one of those tedious people who rails against the coronation of 'student-athletes.' I have heard the argument that big-time athletics bring in loads of money to universities. I don't believe the money goes anywhere other than back into the sports teams, but that's another story.
author: Susan Orlean

quote: I'm not good at a lot of things. I am not good at keeping my room clean. I am not good at eating healthy. I am not good at sports anymore. I used to be! Not so much anymore.
author: Zendaya

quote: The 2006 federal Internet gaming statute is not ambiguous. It does not prohibit gambling on fantasy sports.
author: Eric Schneiderman

quote: Our investigation has found that, unlike traditional fantasy sports, daily fantasy sports companies are engaged in illegal gambling under New York law, causing the same kinds of social and economic harms as other forms of illegal gambling and misleading New York consumers.
author: Eric Schneiderman

quote: Daily fantasy sports is neither victimless nor harmless, and it is clear that DraftKings and FanDuel are the leaders of a massive, multi-billion-dollar scheme intended to evade the law and fleece sports fans across the country.
author: Eric Schneiderman

quote: Daily fantasy sports is much closer to online poker than it is to traditional fantasy sports.
author: Eric Schneiderman

quote: Unlike most traditional, season-long fantasy sports sites, which make most of their money from administrative fees and advertising, FanDuel and DraftKings take a cut of every bet. That is what bookies do, and it is illegal in New York.
author: Eric Schneiderman

quote: Predominantly I'm an Adidas guy who walks around in sports gear all the time because there's always a ball right next to me somewhere. I do a lot of sports, but I do enjoy wearing a lot of suits.
author: Mads Mikkelsen

quote: I haven't watched that much TV, to be honest. To be honest, I don't watch that many films anymore - partly because I don't have time; secondly, because I watch a lot of sports, and I love watching sports.
author: Mads Mikkelsen

quote: I go to the pub, hang out with my family - that's pretty much it. I also do a lot of sports when I get the chance. I'm actually a pretty mellow guy.
author: Mads Mikkelsen

quote: I was into sports and swimming as a kid and didn't spend a whole lot of time sitting down. I was a gymnast.
author: Mads Mikkelsen

quote: Where is women's sports prominently displayed with the men? Tennis is the only thing I can think of.
author: Ronda Rousey

quote: Judo was one of those sports where they give you guidelines but then try to tell you to develop your own style.
author: Ronda Rousey

quote: If I had not been dyslexic, I wouldn't have needed sports. I would have been like every other kid. Instead, I found my one thing, and I was never going to let go of it. That little dyslexic kid is always in the back of your head.
author: Caitlyn Jenner

quote: I got into sports because that was a way to prove your masculinity. I was good at it.
author: Caitlyn Jenner

quote: Sports saved my life.
author: Caitlyn Jenner

quote: My greatest gift in life was being dyslexic. It made me special. It made me different. If I had not been dyslexic, I wouldn't have needed sports.
author: Caitlyn Jenner

quote: It's so great to watch sports live. I think everyone should watch it up close once, if possible. I would like to see every sport live at least once to fully appreciate what's happening on the court or on the field or on the ice or whatever the playing surface may be.
author: Diane Lane

quote: I like to follow my favorite team and talk sports with my band or fans. You won't believe how many musicians are sports fans. We have so much time on tour that we need these outlets for relaxation.
author: Garth Brooks

quote: I think, without question, the way someone plays sports shows something about inherently who they are, you know?
author: Hill Harper

quote: I started modeling when I was about 2 or 3 years old; I started with Baby Guess, and I did Guess Kids, and that was the extent of my modeling career as a kid. I took all of my elementary, middle and high school years off to focus on school and sports.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: I love sports - I used to play volleyball really competitively...I went to Junior Olympic qualifiers, and I've ridden horses my whole life.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: I come from a very sporting family and played many sports as a lad.
author: Martin McGuinness

quote: I'm not a girly girl. I go to the bar. I like to get dirty. I love sports. I'm like the son my dad never had.
author: Kaley Cuoco

quote: Music has done a lot to enhance the emotions of sports. It's played in arenas. Whenever there is footage cut together they're always using music. And it goes together, you know.
author: Ice Cube

quote: When you think about the NASCAR brand, it resonates everywhere. They have the No. 1 sports brand.
author: Magic Johnson

quote: I have a fond place in my heart for Seattle, so I hope that an NBA team comes back to this great city, this great sports city.
author: Magic Johnson

quote: My work ethic is from sports.
author: Magic Johnson

quote: Seven has always been my lucky number. It's on my guitar pick; in sports, that was always the number I was, and 'Riser' is my seventh album. With this album kind of coming to an end and having seven nominations at the ACMs, it feels like a bigger story in play for me, and it's the perfect number. I wouldn't have wanted eight!
author: Dierks Bentley

quote: I talk to people of different ages, and a guy who's 38 who says, 'I could've played Major League Baseball, but I had this knee injury...' Yeah, probably not. It's a big thing with men and sports, where they think they could have touched that thing.
author: Christopher Guest

quote: When you play sports like tennis, you're alone, and that's a good school for life, but it's also a good school for life to bring your best and make those around you better, too - helping others in difficult moments.
author: Jurgen Klopp

quote: Foreign policy simply cannot be judged by today's headlines that chalk up victories and defeats like so many box scores in the sports sections.
author: Condoleezza Rice

quote: Growing up, all I did was play sports. I always loved music, but I never even thought I'd be on stage one day.
author: Cole Swindell

quote: After I went to college, I realized that no matter how much I loved sports, I was ready to have fun, and that was right when I started to sing.
author: Cole Swindell

quote: For a kid, self-esteem can be as close at hand as a sports victory or a sense of belonging in a peer group. It's a much more complicated and elusive proposition for adults, subject to the responsibilities and vicissitudes of grown-up life.
author: Meghan Daum

quote: I always tell writers that it's good to have an area of expertise. It's a really practical answer, I know, but know about science or about sports or about medicine, so you can work as a science writer or a sports writer. Don't just know about yourself.
author: Meghan Daum

quote: Every successful sports season I had included detailed daily itineraries. We received one in the morning and one before practice, and they set us up to win.
author: Lewis Howes

quote: I never played sports or got into the whole guy camaraderie of, like, 'I love you, man! Seniors forever!' So suddenly being in the military with these guys who were under these very heightened circumstances, isolated from their families, living this very kind of Greek lifestyle, it changed my life in a really big way.
author: Adam Driver

quote: Let's face it: in advertising, you are paid more, but you die younger. It's not very forgiving. Like sports stars, you're in it during your better years, and then you're out looking for work.
author: Jerry Della Femina

quote: I don't follow sports that much now, but I was a Phoenix Suns fanatic in the early '90s.
author: Jesse Eisenberg

quote: I'm not much involved in sports, and I don't play, either.
author: Kriti Sanon

quote: Sports can't be run by governments.
author: Kapil Sibal

quote: Governments getting involved in sports activities would ultimately damage sports.
author: Kapil Sibal

quote: If there are malpractices in sports, part of the solution lies in the organisations themselves taking a very strong view and cleaning up the mess from within.
author: Kapil Sibal

quote: When I was really young, I can remember being into fashion, but I was really into horses and sports.
author: Kendall Jenner

quote: Sometimes emotions can win fights. Sometimes letting your feelings out in a fight can win you the fight. When it means the world to you, it's not just a sports contest - a boxing match for money or belts.
author: Tyson Fury

quote: I've always been a guy who wants to play sports, not watch them.
author: Shaun White

quote: I always tell people that our sports aren't that dangerous.
author: Shaun White

quote: What drives me now is the fact that I feel like I still have so many tricks that I want to learn and so many things that I can still do. And so many cool things outside of sports that I have been doing.
author: Shaun White

quote: My exercise regime is a mix of gymming, marital arts, sports, etc.
author: Sushant Singh Rajput

quote: What's been missing from regions outside of Silicon Valley is a 'playbook.' In American football, a playbook contains a sports team's strategies and plays. It struck me that every region needs its own industry playbook on how to compete globally.
author: Steve Blank

quote: Immigrants use debt intelligently. They understand the difference between active debt: creating a business, or something to make business better, and dead debt: buying that new sports car or the 60 inch television. Those things don't lead to the good life. They delay getting it.
author: Fabrizio Moreira

quote: Pfizer's actually teamed up with my nonprofit organization, which is called Adaptive Action Sports. I cofounded this organization in 2005 to help people with physical disabilities get involved in action sports, go snowboarding, skateboarding.
author: Amy Purdy

quote: I was into basketball, but then once I found contact sports, it was over. I never played basketball again in my life.
author: Daniel Cormier

quote: I've never been in the top three of Sports Personality. And I won't be in the top three again. You have just got to accept what it is.
author: Mo Farah

quote: Boxing should focus on pitting champion versus champion - those are the fights that everyone wants to see. The sports also needs to work on developing new heroes and personalities. I'd like to see more vignettes on fighters, focusing on their lives, goals and stories. Boxers need to be larger than life.
author: Sugar Ray Leonard

quote: I'm honoured and delighted to be named the 'Irish Times'/Irish Sports Council Sportswoman of the Year 2014. This has been an amazing year for me and for Irish women in sport, and I would like to congratulate all the finalists in their respective fields who have excelled at major sporting events.
author: Katie Taylor

quote: If you look at all aspects of all sports, everything comes down to basics and fundamentals.
author: Robbie Lawler

quote: Adidas is one of the biggest companies in the world. To have a company like that, a mainstream company, a major sports company, to say they want me, it's awesome.
author: Robbie Lawler

quote: That's really what drew me into wrestling. To see my own uncle put on the mask every Friday to go into the ring, and me putting on his masks to play wrestle with him. It was a whole different world when it came down to sports.
author: Rey Mysterio

quote: I am excited to join Combate Americas on NBC UNIVERSO, and look forward to building this incredible MMA sports brand and supporting the extremely talented athletes on its growing roster.
author: Rey Mysterio

quote: I photographed all kinds of sports - Formula 1, Formula Atlantic. And anybody who knows me knows that, from the day they invented video cameras, I used to lug them around when you had to carry the pack here and the big camera here, plus the diaper bag and a baby and the purse or whatever.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: I remember my first 'Sports Illustrated' shoot was with the photographer Walter Iooss, and Julie Campbell was the editor, and we were at the president of Mexico's private house in Cancun - this was before anything else that's now in Cancun even existed. And they told me to get a tan, so I spent all morning in the sun, and I was burnt.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: When doing sports... on the water, it's crucial to stop aging by protecting your skin.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: Colleges produce more sports therapists than engineers. Perhaps because America is a sporty country: a lot of outdoors.
author: Azim Premji

quote: Believe it or not, I worked four summers in college as a sports writer covering baseball for a parks and rec department in Bayonne, N.J.
author: George R. R. Martin

quote: The sports apparel industry was dominated by the big shoe companies. But there was a void in apparel and I decided to fill it.
author: Kevin Plank

quote: As the National Football League and other pro sports increasingly reckon with the early dementia, mental health issues, suicides and even criminal behavior of former players, the risk of what's known as chronic traumatic encephalopathy (CTE), is becoming clear.
author: Jeffrey Kluger

quote: The families of many athletes - incensed at the sports leagues and hoping to make games safer overall - are increasingly making the brains of players who die prematurely and suspiciously available for study. Some athletes are even making the bequest themselves.
author: Jeffrey Kluger

quote: Most of us have had that experience - at around puberty - of realising that, despite whatever efforts we put into our chosen sports, we will become at best competent.
author: Will Self

quote: If the government announced that it was going to allocate a vast tranche of education funding purely to the pupils at the best public schools, there would be a national outcry - and yet this is precisely what the Olympics represents in terms of sports funding.
author: Will Self

quote: I hit my knees and I went to him with that and I said God I want to do what you want. I don't want sports to be an idol in my life.
author: Ben Zobrist

quote: Outside the Olympics, there are massive discrepancies within all sports. But the positive side for me is that the Olympics are the biggest platform there is, and there's total equality across all sports.
author: Lizzie Armitstead

quote: Being a celebrity you always get really good seats to sporting events but you never get as good seats as the photographers get. And I really love sports. So one of the scams I have going now is I want to learn sports photography so I can get better seats at a sporting event.
author: Drew Carey

quote: Being a celebrity, you always get really good seats to sporting events, but you never get as good seats as the photographers get. And I really love sports.
author: Drew Carey

quote: But sports photography isn't something you just pick up overnight. You can't do it once a year for fun and expect to do a good job. And I take pride in what I do.
author: Drew Carey

quote: International soccer has been a big part of my love for the sport. I love the Men's National Team. I can say that they're my favorite sports team.
author: Drew Carey

quote: Sports has kept me on the straight and narrow path.
author: Tommy Lasorda

quote: The paradox of endurance sports is that an athlete can never work as hard as he wants, because if he pushes himself too far, his hematocrit will fall.
author: Malcolm Gladwell

quote: When you write about sports, you're allowed to engage in mischief. Nothing is at stake.
author: Malcolm Gladwell

quote: In tennis, you can have a bad set and still win. The part of track cycling that is difficult to find in other sports is that it's so final; there's no second chance if you make a mistake.
author: Victoria Pendleton

quote: It would be great to be recognised for my achievements, but Sports Personality isn't about that.
author: Victoria Pendleton

quote: When we do 'Sports Illustrated,' it starts the night before. You do a St. Tropez tan that night, then baby oil gel, then body color.
author: Chrissy Teigen

quote: When I was a kid, the idea of gettin' paid to paint your face... listen, I grew up in Ossining, New York, a nice little town by the Hudson, and nothin' ever interested me except being your usual high school big shot, which I was an' loved it, played all the sports and goofed around, always out on the street with the guys, everything was funny t'me.
author: Peter Falk

quote: I love sports. I love animals. I love kids. I want to save the world. So how do I combine all those things? I don't know.
author: Joan Jett

quote: I remember running at school sports day, and I would win everything, but I wasn't a super athlete or a superstar at high school.
author: Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce

quote: I have a great deal of respect for any women that will enter the world of little boys of sports.
author: Jennifer Garner

quote: Some anthems are great for sports. You've got the Russian national anthem... 'O Canada,' how wonderful is that for hockey... but I chose the Italian national song because at my first World Cup, I saw the Italians play four times, and they won all four times - they won the championship.
author: George Vecsey

quote: When I was a kid, my father brought home the autobiography of Sid Luckman, the great Chicago Bears quarterback - probably an extra copy from the sports department where he worked. It was the first sports biography I ever read.
author: George Vecsey

quote: Television is making sports universal; for the same reason, big-time soccer is growing more popular in the United States.
author: George Vecsey

quote: There may not be much future for the kind of sports column I did.
author: George Vecsey

quote: I know, I know - men have that extra hero gene in their foolish makeup; it's part of our charm. But I happen to know some women who have their inner sports hero, too.
author: George Vecsey

quote: This occasional sports columnist, who has been to his share of Super Bowls, had been glad to be home on Super Bowl Sunday, but the scary commercials made me want to be in the melee of the arena, where you are not aware of commercials.
author: George Vecsey

quote: I will always treasure the privilege of writing the 'Sports of The Times' column.
author: George Vecsey

quote: In recent generations, women's sports have been a blessing. Some of us can remember the bad old days in the '50s, when we would discover in casual schoolyard play that a girl could outrun most of us or hold her own in basketball or hit a softball - but there were no teams, no coaches, for girls.
author: George Vecsey

quote: Some religious guys in sports give the impression, 'I've got something you don't have.'
author: George Vecsey

quote: Some of the most inspiring moments in sports have come from players with physical defects. Tom Dempsey, born without toes on his right foot, kicked a 63-yard field goal in 1970, using a straighter, wider shoe.
author: George Vecsey

quote: Youth sports could not exist without millions of volunteers and modestly paid coaches who teach our children how to skate and catch and dribble and also how to get along with others.
author: George Vecsey

quote: Hockey suffers from being compared to itself in ways that other sports are not. Every four years, some of us fawn over Olympic hockey, a great event with bigger rinks, minimal goonishness and national pride in addition to the heightened skills of veritable all-star squads.
author: George Vecsey

quote: I will openly admit that I've never really followed hockey. Given my New England upbringing, I have always adhered to the Celtics, Patriots, Red Sox, Bruins mantra of professional sports fandom, but hockey was definitely the lowest sport on the totem pole - even when the Bruins won the Stanley Cup.
author: Rachel Nichols

quote: Michael Phelps is a sporting god among men. It is hard to say if anyone will ever match his accomplishments, but it has been an honor to see him become a legend. He makes me proud of the American sports institution and proud of the sports that get mass attention only every four years.
author: Johnny Weir

quote: Even as a little kid, I was fascinated by newspapers and magazines. They were my TV. I'd be the first one up to grab the morning paper, mainly to look at the sports pictures, the war pictures.
author: Dan Jenkins

quote: The first thing they gave me at 'Sports Illustrated' was a first-class air card. 'And oh, by the way, there's the petty cash drawer,' they told me. 'Take a few thousand dollars for expenses.'
author: Dan Jenkins

quote: The key to any good sports story is identifying the defining moment. In football games or a boxing match, it's usually pretty obvious. But in golf, sometimes it happens on Thursday. Usually it's Sunday, but guys who don't know the game, they can miss it.
author: Dan Jenkins

quote: Sally Jenkins of the 'Washington Post' is the best sports columnist in the country. Second best is Gene Wojciechowski of ESPN.com, and third is Dan Wetzel on Yahoo!
author: Dan Jenkins

quote: When I first started designing sportswear, I felt that women weren't represented in sports performance. I felt that men were dressed really well both technically and visually, and women were almost like an afterthought.
author: Stella McCartney

quote: I'm a character and a sports entertainer and a wrestler, but I'm also a father and a husband and a provider.
author: Roman Reigns

quote: I hate to let people down. I was like that in sports and I was like that in comedy. I was like that at work. When I worked General Motors and stuff like that, when I say something, I mean it.
author: Bernie Mac

quote: The fewer rules a coach has, the fewer rules there are for players to break.
author: John Madden

quote: Sports has always been a pass-through. You pay for something, and then you pass it through to television, you pass it through to advertisers, or you pass it through to season-ticket holders, luxury boxes and then the fans. Then it all adds up, and you take in more than you pass out.
author: John Madden

quote: I tried golf for a while, but I wasn't very good at it, so I didn't play a lot of golf. I enjoy all sports, not just football. I like basketball, baseball, and I got into the World Cup. So really, sports in general are my life, and football specifically.
author: John Madden

quote: I was an old tackle riding around talking to people about sports. Like I've said to a lot of people over the years, 'I only go where old tackles go, and if an old tackle does not belong there, I'm not going.'
author: John Madden

quote: Don't use your advance to buy an antique sports car, diamonds by the yard, or a bottle of wine from Thomas Jefferson's cellar instead of investing in your book.
author: M. J. Rose

quote: People forget that track and field is one of the hardest sports because we compete against all the world. There are many sports when you are up against only 15 or 20 countries.
author: Greg Rutherford

quote: I was quite lucky: although my dad worked a lot, whenever he was free, he would play sports with me and my brother, and I can't wait to do that with my child.
author: Greg Rutherford

quote: It will be good fun finding out what sport baby's good at; perhaps it will be something obscure. My parents were fantastic at taking me to training sessions and letting me try lots of different sports, so I want to do the same.
author: Greg Rutherford

quote: I'm incredibly competitive in all sports in a way that is so mystifying to my wife because she grew up playing the violin and piano. I've always been like that.
author: Geoff Dyer

quote: I have always thought you could take the measure of a man by his sports manners - that is to say, the way in which he conducts himself on the playing field, or even over a game of chess or cards.
author: Graydon Carter

quote: I enjoy sports in person.
author: Shania Twain

quote: The growth of women's soccer and women's sports all around the world has been slow.
author: Abby Wambach

quote: When you're a pro athlete, life is very narcissistic - everything relates back to you and how you play. When you are getting out of pro sports, you suddenly have to get a little more mindful of what's going on around you and how you affect the rest of the world.
author: Abby Wambach

quote: There have been times - and not just on 'The Newsroom,' but on 'The West Wing,' 'Sports Night,' 'Studio 60'... - where it was hard to look the cast and crew in the eye, when I put a script on the table that I knew just wasn't good enough.
author: Aaron Sorkin

quote: I get the 'The New York Times' and 'Los Angeles Times' thrown at my door every morning. I'll read the front page of 'The New York Times,' then the op-eds, then scan the arts section and then the sports section. Then I do the same with the 'L.A. Times.'
author: Aaron Sorkin

quote: I was into sports and dancing. I ran track. I have a lot of stamina.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: Team sports aren't my thing. I find it easier to pick something up if I can do it at my own speed. And you don't need a partner to go running, you don't need a particular place, like in tennis, just a pair of trainers.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: I think I was a good student, because I jumped over a school. My main interest was basically history and literature. Sports were basically basketball and swimming at a pool. I was so happy.
author: Shimon Peres

quote: It's a round ball and a round bat, and you got to hit it square.
author: Pete Rose

quote: I like Barack Obama as a person. He's articulate, he knows sports, his brother-in-law's a coach. He always has the athletes to the White House. But I don't know about some of his policies and some of these people in Congress.
author: Pete Rose

quote: I had come across a few sports psychologists, and I had no time for nearly all of them. I just don't think they work in a team environment.
author: Brian O'Driscoll

quote: I've never bought a sports car.
author: Brian O'Driscoll

quote: I have done 'Sports Illustrated,' but I don't regret it because it portrayed me in a positive way - as an athlete.
author: Alex Morgan

quote: I rarely felt or noticed any real divide between girls and boys when I was growing up. Maybe it was because I was so involved in sports and competed with the boys. Maybe it was my mom and dad, who constantly instilled confidence in me and never made me feel as though there were boy activities and girl activities.
author: Alex Morgan

quote: It wasn't until 1999 when my idols Mia Hamm and Kristine Lilly took home the women's World Cup trophy at the Rose Bowl in front of 40 million TV viewers that I remember thinking how rare it was to see women play sports on TV.
author: Alex Morgan

quote: I started off playing sports when I was five years old. I played three or four sports all throughout the year.
author: Alex Morgan

quote: I am huge water sports fan. I love to jet ski, speedboat, water ski. So I love to get away to somewhere sunny and just get on the water and have some fun with some friends.
author: Douglas Booth

quote: I don't think there's anything that is a greater area of discrimination against women today than the fact that nowhere in the world is there a female role model in team sports that more than half of a general audience would recognize.
author: Warren Farrell

quote: Men's competitive team sports focus on the balance between individual achievement and team achievement with the emphasis on team achievement.
author: Warren Farrell

quote: I'm a big sports fan in general.
author: Luke Bryan

quote: I like a lot of sports. Especially football - it's my favourite sport. My uncle played football in Barcelona for nine years and played for Spain in three World Cups.
author: Rafael Nadal

quote: Regardless of what people think of the WWE, we're great at storylines; we're great at drawing money. We're great at causing controversy, and when the other sports do it, they usually do better. It keeps it interesting and makes it fun for the fans.
author: Shawn Michaels

quote: I put so much pressure on myself to be perfect. Between homework and sports and drama and being social, I slept about four hours a night through high school and college.
author: Allison Williams

quote: There isn't a flaw in his golf or his makeup. He will win more majors than Arnold Palmer and me combined. Somebody is going to dust my records. It might as well be Tiger, because he's such a great kid.
author: Jack Nicklaus

quote: He has the finest, fundamentally sound golf swing I've ever seen.
author: Jack Nicklaus

quote: He's going to be around a long, long time, if his body holds up. That's always a concern with a lot of players because of how much they play. A lot of guys can't handle it. But it looks like he can.
author: Jack Nicklaus

quote: When I think about dropping team sports and picking up surfing and also then geeking out radio control planes and gadgetry and all that stuff I love, that's what really now has led me in big part to GoPro.
author: Nick Woodman

quote: Americans' addiction to sports, with the NFL at the top, is based on the excitement generated by the potential for the unexpected great play which can only happen with honest competition from great athletes.
author: Arlen Specter
